teaser: When you think fast delivery of different products bought online you usually think of Amazon, eBay or Zappos. Well Google just rolled out a same day delivery service in the Bay Area. And Gizmodo’s Leslie Horn talks about why cutting edge tech has become so important to rap music.
description: When you think fast delivery of different products bought online you usually think of Amazon, eBay or Zappos. Well Google just rolled out a same day delivery service in the Bay Area. And Gizmodo’s Leslie Horn talks about why cutting edge tech has become so important to rap music.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, September 26, 2013
